name: FireFly(萤火)
description:
Please be sure to know

This is a passionate, adrenaline pumping zombie mowing game, with its own story, the story of the game is not yet finished, I will do my best to complete this game in the future, collect opinions, increase the gameplay, and make sure not to disappoint every single one of you players.
The current plot of the game has two chapters, about an hour long, 4 characters to choose from, with endless mode and unlimited firepower two modes (more will be launched in the future), for players to start a bloody fight, the game is more decompressed, relax, suitable for leisure time to play.

Story

Although this game has a story, there are many imperfections in the story, there are no cutscenes, and the story can not give the player a strong sense of substitution for the time being, so I release it with early access. Please do not bring a bad shopping experience because of impulse consumption.

Operating environment and troubleshooting

1. The developers themselves tested that the game could be run trouble-free on a computer that had been reinstalled five years ago and had no software installed, as long as Directx components and C++2015-2022 were installed. The first time players install this game Steam will install these two components for players, if you have such problems please verify this game.

2. If you still can not solve please try to delete 《FireFly》 cache files, you need to open windows show hidden files option, C:\Users\ your computer name \AppData\Local\FireFly, delete all files in the directory.

3. If you open the game and you are prompted to update the graphics driver, then you may need to update the graphics driver.

4. If the above operations still cannot solve the problem, then there may be a problem with your windows system, and you are advised to reinstall the system.

The game supports Chinese female voice dubbing, there is no male voice dubbing for the time being, I will soon personally dubbing for boys, English dubbing may have to wait, because the author is practicing English.

A passionate fight
